3 bed semi-detached house for sale

Property features

  • Practical family home
  • Beautifully presented
  • Three bedrooms
  • Stunning garden
  • Large, two room log cabin with power
  • Off-road parking

Property description

This practical house has been tastefully updated by the current owner and offers well-presented, spacious accommodation along with a superb rear garden and off-road parking. It occupies a convenient location to the southeast of the city, within easy reach of the city centre, local shops and Addenbrooke's hospital.

The spacious entrance hall has stairs to the first floor with storage under and access to the principle rooms. Enjoying a dual aspect, the living/dining room has a feature electric fire and double doors to the conservatory, which offers splendid views of the rear garden. The kitchen has a range of fitted base and eye-level units with granite-effect worktops and tiled splashbacks, space for cooker with extractor hood over, space for fridge/freezer and plumbing for dishwasher. To the side of the property there is another hallway, which has doors to the front and rear garden and access to a storage cupboard, utility cupboard with plumbing for washing machine and a WC with wash basin.

On the first floor, the landing has a window to the side aspect and a hatch providing loft access. There are three bedrooms, two of which are double in size, with all including fitted cupboards. Fully tiled, the bathroom has a corner bath with shower attachment, corner shower cubicle with mains shower, pedestal wash basin and WC.

Outside, the property is set back behind a boundary wall and a block paved driveway, which provides parking for at least two vehicles. To the rear of the property there is a delightful, well-manicured garden, which is fully enclosed and generous in size. It is mainly laid to lawn and features a variety of well-stocked flower/shrub beds and a patio area. Of particular note is the impressive, modern log cabin at the rear of the garden. It features two generous rooms and has insulation, power and light.

Council Tax

Local authority

Cambridge

Estimated tax band D Council tax cost £157 /month
when paid over 10 months
Council tax costs explained

The Council Tax cost displayed is based on the council tax band and on the basis of 2 adults living at the property. The monthly cost shown excludes any discounts and is rounded to the nearest pound.

Full information on Council Tax discount entitlements can be found on the Gov.UKs website.

Water Supply £13 Sewerage £25 Estimated water cost £38 /month
Water costs explained

Water consumption is based on average water usage for the predicted occupancy of the property based on the number of bedrooms.

Total annual consumption (in cubic meters) is then averaged into a monthly cost.

Note: If you have 2 separate suppliers for water and sewage, you may receive 2 separate bills.
